title: Belly dancers to florists: Six African coronavirus heroes
description: Uplifting stories about African people doing exceptional things in the age of coronavirus.
content:
Image copyrightReuters/Adene's Farm Flowers
People in Africa are doing exceptional and surprising things to help others during the coronavirus pandemic. 
Here are just six uplifting stories of everyday heroes.
